pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pharmacometric Model Building Using 'shiny' // Develop Nonlinear Mixed Effects (NLME) models for pharmacometrics using a 'shiny' interface. The Pharmacometric Modeling Language (PML) code updates in real time given changes to user inputs. Models can be executed using the 'Certara.RsNLME' package. Additional support to generate the underlying 'Certara.RsNLME' code to recreate the corresponding model in R is provided in the user interface.
